scripts.//: TOTAL HACK to use heroku cache (it is supposed to be passed into the buildpack, not hardcode), but will work without it
scripts.postinstall: cd client; npm install; ([ -d /app/tmp/cache ] && bower install -p --config.storage.packages=/app/tmp/cache/bower) || bower install -p
scripts.clean: cd client; rm -rf tmp node_modules bower_components; npm install && bower install; cd ..
